author: Epic Games
description:
Discover how Arena’s abilities supercharge your combat potential. Boost your attack power, shield yourself from harm, and heal through the chaos. Master Arena’s evolving powers and turn every fight into your advantage.
Available August 30 on PC in Australia, New Zealand, Japan, and Korea. 
 
Pre-purchase now for in-game bonuses! https://epic.gm/lost-soul-aside
title: Lost Soul Aside | Arena Power Trailer
